processinfo.head: Processing Information

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The Classon Avenue Presbyterian Church of Brooklyn opened in 1869. Its first pastor was Joseph P. Duryea. The Church merged with the Bedford-Central Presbyterian Church in 1961.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of legal documents spanning the period 1867 to 1961 and relating to the property of the Classon Avenue Presbyterian Church of Brooklyn. Items include bonds, memoranda, mortgage assignments, releases, and title abstracts. Records also include a survey of the property, with a block and lot plan, as well as information pertaining to the prior ownership of the property from 1766 onward.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: A manual, newsletter, and service program of the Classon Avenue Presbyterian Church are available in 1986.028, Presbyterian Churches of Brooklyn collection, 1854-1984, held at the Brooklyn Historical Society.
